ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New UI
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow! Cool!! How do you get to select that as your setup? I m not sure how to do alot of stuff just yet. luv, -Su ... in ... Jaggedpine. ... safely
ygData.messageBody:
Wow! Cool!!
How do you get to select that as your setup? I'm not sure how to do alot of
stuff just yet.
luv,
-Su


> Here is the UI I use at the moment.
>
> Picture can be found here -->
> http://webpages.charter.net/trelyrien/quartz.jpg
>
> You can down load and view the read me file here --> :
> www.machin-shin.net/temp/quartz.zip
>
> Really the best looking I've seen yet.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
> Sent: Saturday, July 27, 2002 8:55 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] New UI
>
>
> > > I'm DLing the patch right now. Says I have over 3 hours left. 21.6k
> > > connection can really suck sometimes.
> > > I hope it doesn't lag too badly. I wonder if my darkelf wizard is kos
in
> > > jaggedpine.. I hope not.
> > Your DE Wizard will most certainly be KOS to the residents of
Jaggedpine.
> > To get to Jaggedpine, you need to go thru Surefall Glade, which you will
> > also be KOS.
> > Jaggedpine residents are on a Karana faction.
> >
> Karana faction? Woohoo! She's not KOS! I spent months killing gnolls in
> highpass and such to improve my faction with Karanas residents. I can
safely
> enter surefall glade without being attacked or anything. :-)
> luv,
> -Su
